content:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Golden Gate Park to Haight-Ashbury: 7.
Golden Gate Park to Sunset District: 10.
Golden Gate Park to Marina District: 16.
Golden Gate Park to Financial District: 26.
Golden Gate Park to Union Square: 22.
Haight-Ashbury to Golden Gate Park: 7.
Haight-Ashbury to Sunset District: 15.
Haight-Ashbury to Marina District: 17.
Haight-Ashbury to Financial District: 21.
Haight-Ashbury to Union Square: 17.
Sunset District to Golden Gate Park: 11.
Sunset District to Haight-Ashbury: 15.
Sunset District to Marina District: 21.
Sunset District to Financial District: 30.
Sunset District to Union Square: 30.
Marina District to Golden Gate Park: 18.
Marina District to Haight-Ashbury: 16.
Marina District to Sunset District: 19.
Marina District to Financial District: 17.
Marina District to Union Square: 16.
Financial District to Golden Gate Park: 23.
Financial District to Haight-Ashbury: 19.
Financial District to Sunset District: 31.
Financial District to Marina District: 15.
Financial District to Union Square: 9.
Union Square to Golden Gate Park: 22.
Union Square to Haight-Ashbury: 18.
Union Square to Sunset District: 26.
Union Square to Marina District: 18.
Union Square to Financial District: 9.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Golden Gate Park at 9:00AM. Sarah will be at Haight-Ashbury from 5:00PM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Sarah for a minimum of 105 minutes. Patricia will be at Sunset District from 5:00PM to 7:45PM. You'd like to meet Patricia for a minimum of 45 minutes. Matthew will be at Marina District from 9:15AM to 12:00PM. You'd like to meet Matthew for a minimum of 15 minutes. Joseph will be at Financial District from 2:15PM to 6:45PM. You'd like to meet Joseph for a minimum of 30 minutes. Robert will be at Union Square from 10:15AM to 9:45PM. You'd like to meet Robert for a minimum of 15 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.

SOLUTION:

To optimize the schedule and meet as many friends as possible while satisfying all constraints, here's the best itinerary:

1. Start at Golden Gate Park at 9:00AM.
2. Travel to Marina District (16 minutes) to meet Matthew from 9:16AM to 9:31AM (15 minutes).
3. Travel to Union Square (16 minutes) to meet Robert from 9:47AM to 10:02AM (15 minutes).
4. Travel to Financial District (9 minutes) to meet Joseph from 10:11AM to 10:41AM (30 minutes). Note: Joseph is available from 2:15PM, but this is a placeholder. Adjusting to meet Joseph later.
   - Actually, Joseph is only available from 2:15PM, so this won't work. Instead, after meeting Robert, we can explore other options.
   - Revised: After meeting Robert at Union Square, travel to Haight-Ashbury (18 minutes) to meet Sarah later, but Sarah is only available from 5:00PM. This is not optimal.
   - Better: After meeting Robert, travel to Sunset District (26 minutes) to meet Patricia later, but Patricia is only available from 5:00PM. Not optimal.
   - Alternative: After meeting Robert, have free time until Joseph is available at 2:15PM.
5. Meet Joseph at Financial District from 2:15PM to 2:45PM (30 minutes).
6. Travel to Sunset District (31 minutes) to meet Patricia from 3:16PM to 4:01PM (45 minutes). But Patricia is only available from 5:00PM. Adjust to meet Patricia from 5:00PM to 5:45PM.
7. Travel to Haight-Ashbury (15 minutes) to meet Sarah from 6:00PM to 7:45PM (105 minutes).

Final optimized schedule:

```json
{
  "itinerary": [
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Matthew",
      "start_time": "09:16",
      "end_time": "09:31"
    },
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Robert",
      "start_time": "09:47",
      "end_time": "10:02"
    },
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Joseph",
      "start_time": "14:15",
      "end_time": "14:45"
    },
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Patricia",
      "start_time": "17:00",
      "end_time": "17:45"
    },
    {
      "action": "meet",
      "person": "Sarah",
      "start_time": "18:00",
      "end_time": "19:45"
    }
  ]
}
```

This schedule meets all friends while satisfying all time constraints.
